channel.title: Need a hoster!
channel.description:
I need a hoster for my server, my computer won't take the load anymore and I need your help!
All you have to do is:
Keep server online as much as possible Have a good RAM capacity.
You'll get full ownership rights plus whatever else you require!
I haven't ever had to use a hoster, so you're at an advantage! I'm willing to bend anything for you!
Best Regards, Mistake

item.title: Need a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You’re not allowed to request a hoster, please either host yourself or else get VPS.

Read full topic
